import { useState } from "react"; const SearchFlights = () => { const [ret, setRet] = useState(false) function roundtrip() { const round = document.querySelector("#round") const retrn = document.querySelector("#returnDate") if(round.checked){ retrn.disabled = false } else{ retrn.disabled = true } } function handleRev(){ const fromSelect = document.getElementById("from") const toSelect = document.getElementById("to") const temp = fromSelect.value fromSelect.value = toSelect.value toSelect.value = temp } return ( <>
